data.prayer: Father, help the 127,371 believers in Loreto to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 756,728 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Loreto, Peru
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Loreto, Peru.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Loreto, Peru will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Loreto, Peru so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Barasano, Southern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Barasano, Southern people.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Loreto, Peru.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Loreto.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Loreto, Peru has a population of 884,100.

We estimate Loreto has 127,371 people who might know Jesus, 704,218 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 52,510 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Loreto, Peru. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Loreto
